arguments.name: appdomain
arguments.desc: Change default name of AppDomain sent (default value is totesLegit) *Domain always unloaded*

arguments.name: amsi
arguments.desc: Attempts to disable AMSI via in memory patching (If successful AMSI will be disabled for the entire life of process)

arguments.name: etw
arguments.desc: Attempts to disable ETW via in memory patching (If successful ETW will be disabled for the entire life of process unless reverted)

arguments.name: revertetw
arguments.desc: Attempts to disable ETW via in memory patching and then repatches it back to original state

arguments.name: mailslot
arguments.desc: Switches to using mailslots to redirect console output

arguments.name: main
arguments.desc: Changes entry point to Main() (default value is Main(string[] args)), change to 0 for Main()

arguments.name: slotname
arguments.desc: Changes default name of mailslot (default value is totesLegit), only used if mailslot flag is set to 1

arguments.name: pipe
arguments.desc: Change default name of named pipe (default value is totesLegit)
